alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 15 at 4:08AM EDT until October 15 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional minor coastal flooding is possible during Monday morning`s high tide. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/12 PM 9.7/10.2 1.9/ 2.3 1.6/ 2.0 2 MINOR 16/01 AM 8.5/ 9.0 0.7/ 1.1 1.1/ 1.6 1 NONE 16/01 PM 9.5/10.0 1.7/ 2.2 1.3/ 1.8 0 MINOR 17/01 AM 8.6/ 9.1 0.8/ 1.3 1.2/ 1.7 0 NONE 17/01 PM 9.3/ 9.8 1.5/ 2.0 1.1/ 1.6 0-1 MINOR 18/02 AM 8.2/ 8.7 0.4/ 0.9 1.0/ 1.5 0 NONE BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
